document.full_text: u.s. attorney general eric holder on tuesday warned that americans and law enforcement agencies cannot become complacent after the death of al qaeda leader osama bin laden, which could provoke retaliatory attacks.
document.title: attorney general warns of risks after bin laden death
lines_and_colors: u.s. attorney general eric holder on tuesday warned that americans and law enforcement agencies cannot become complacent after the death of al qaeda leader osama bin laden, which could provoke retaliatory attacks.
